<script type="application/ld+json">
    {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",

    "name": "FPTSHOP",

    <div class="ss-dropdown-button">

        <div class="ss-dropdown cs-dropdown">
            <div class="ss-dropdown-button">
B&#xE1;n ch&#x1EA1;y nh&#x1EA5;t
                <span class="ss-dropdown-arrow ss-dropdown-arrow--triangle"></span>
            </div>
            <div class="ss-dropdown-menu">

                <a class=active href="/phu-kien/bao-da-op-lung?thiet-bi-tuong-thich=dien-thoai&amp;chat-lieu=silicon&amp;loai=op-lung&amp;sort=ban-chay-nhat" onclick="ga('send', 'event', 'Filter Pages (PC)', 'Click Sort', 'Bán chạy nhất');">Bán chạy nhất</a>
